sn9:1.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:1.1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi gehanissite.
sn9:1.1.4_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:1.5.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
sn9:2.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:2.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato supati.
sn9:2.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:3.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā kassapagotto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:3.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kassapagotto divāvihāragato aññataraṁ chetaṁ ovadati.
sn9:3.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmantaṁ kassapagottaṁ saṁvejetukāmā yenāyasmā kassapagotto tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:3.5.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā kassapagotto tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
sn9:4.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:4.1.2_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena cārikaṁ pakkamiṁsu.
sn9:4.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā te bhikkhū apassantī paridevamānā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn9:4.3.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññatarā devatā taṁ devataṁ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
sn9:5.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:5.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando ativelaṁ gihisaññattibahulo viharati.
sn9:5.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato ānandassa anukampikā atthakāmā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ
sn9:5.3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
sn9:6.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:6.1.2_0: Atha kho aññatarā tāvatiṁsakāyikā devatā jālinī nāma āyasmato anuruddhassa purāṇadutiyikā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:7.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā nāgadatto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:7.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgadatto atikālena gāmaṁ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati.
sn9:7.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato nāgadattassa anukampikā atthakāmā āyasmantaṁ
sn9:7.4.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā nāgadatto tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
sn9:8.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:8.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu aññatarasmiṁ kule ativelaṁ ajjhogāḷhappatto viharati.
sn9:8.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yā tasmiṁ kule kulagharaṇī,
sn9:8.1.3_1: tassā vaṇṇaṁ abhinimminitvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:9.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu vesāliyaṁ viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:9.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṁ vajjiputtako sabbaratticāro hoti.
sn9:9.1.3_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu vesāliyā tūriyatāḷitavāditanigghosasaddaṁ sutvā paridevamāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn9:9.3.1_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:9.5.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
sn9:10.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:10.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu yaṁ sudaṁ pubbe ativelaṁ sajjhāyabahulo viharati so aparena samayena appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyati.
sn9:10.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno dhammaṁ asuṇantī yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:10.3.4_0: Yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁva sutaṁ mutaṁ vā;
sn9:11.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:11.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi, seyyathidaṁ—
sn9:11.1.4_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:11.4.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
sn9:12.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:12.1.2_0: Atha kho tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:12.1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā tassa bhikkhuno santike imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn9:13.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā
sn9:13.1.1_1: vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā.
sn9:13.1.2_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anukampikā atthakāmā te bhikkhū saṁvejetukāmā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:13.6.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū tāya devatāya saṁvejitā saṁvegamāpādunti.
sn9:14.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9:14.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā padumaṁ upasiṅghati.
sn9:14.1.3_0: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn9:14.9.1_0: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
